name: Charlie's Grand Adventure
description:
This is the first real game that I made in CAS117!

In Charlie's Grand Adventure, shoot all the enemies for as long as you can! This is meant to be an endless arcade-style shooter. Rack up the highest score that you can!

Credits

Charlie's Grand Adventure is an arcade-style 2D shooter that I created in Michigan State University's CAS117 class. A lot of the assets and programming were developed by MSU, however, I created some of the visuals myself. Additionally, the music was composed by Zach Oberdier.
